parameters.subject: Finding Keyword Ranking For GMB is Done!

parameters.customBody:
={
    "city": "{{ $('On form submission').item.json.City }}",
    "countryCode": "{{ $json.CountryCode }}",
    "includeWebResults": false,
    "language": "en",
    "maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch": 20,
    "maxImages": 0,
    "maximumLeadsEnrichmentRecords": 0,
    "scrapeContacts": false,
    "scrapeDirectories": false,
    "scrapeImageAuthors": false,
    "scrapePlaceDetailPage": false,
    "scrapeReviewsPersonalData": true,
    "scrapeTableReservationProvider": false,
    "searchStringsArray": [
        "{{ $('Loop Over Keywords').item.json.keyword }}"
    ],
    "skipClosedPlaces": false
}

nodes.name: Run an Actor and get dataset

parameters.jsCode:
const countryName = $('On form submission').first().json.Country?.toString().trim().toLowerCase();

const countryMap = {
  "india": "in",
  "united states": "us",
  "usa": "us",
  "united kingdom": "gb",
  "uk": "gb",
  "canada": "ca",
  "australia": "au",
  "germany": "de",
  "france": "fr",
  "spain": "es",
  "italy": "it",
  "netherlands": "nl",
  "singapore": "sg",
  "uae": "ae",
  "united arab emirates": "ae",
  "saudi arabia": "sa",
  "south africa": "za",
  "bangladesh": "bd",
  "pakistan": "pk",
  "sri lanka": "lk",
  "nepal": "np",
  "malaysia": "my",
  "indonesia": "id",
  "philippines": "ph",
  "japan": "jp",
  "china": "cn"
};

const countryCode = countryMap[countryName] || "unknown";

return [
  {
    json: {
      Country: countryName,
      CountryCode: countryCode
    }
  }
];

main.node: Run an Actor and get dataset
